amendment.description: Amendment sought to protect the rights of states that already have reciprocal agreements in place for the concealed carry of firearms to continue enforcing those preexisting agreements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-283 to protect the rights of states that already have reciprocal agreements in place for the concealed carry of firearms to continue enforcing those preexisting agreements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 283 (Roll no. 843).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 283 (Roll no. 843).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Woodall.
